name: BurstOut
description: BurstOut, the winning App for the Most Valuable Application Contest 2012, is an amazing world class App that lets you receive bursts (short video messages) from the Man of God, Pastor Chris Oyakhilome Ph.D. on your mobile device.

name: MySoul Diary
description:
My SoulDiary, is an online organizer that helps you manage your new converts to Christ.

With this amazing web based application, you can track the growth of your new converts; create soul winning plans, record follow-up reports and even your personal testimonies....all at your finger tips!

My SoulDiary does not just keep records of the souls you win. It allows you to enter all kinds of follow up reports, and also track the progress your soul is making, even if you have one million of them! More so, the souls' information is exclusively available to you, the information is never shared.

Why is this relevant for today? Simply put, soul winning is the most important venture in the world and every Christian is called to be involved in it. The time is short and the Master is coming soon, this is why we must plan. Planning helps focus on achievement, no matter what level you are and that is what My SoulDiary will do for you.

My SoulDiary will also send you periodic reminders about your plans as it comes with a notification centre where you can configure your notification preferences.

Right from My SoulDiary you can view prayer guidelines and follow the links to post your comments, and also post on social networks. When you enter the record of a new soul, a special invitation is sent to the soul to register on Yookos. God's number one care is people (John 3:16). It's the most important thing to Him.

Get organized in your soul winning, its God's number one business!

Remember He that wins souls is wise Get wise and log on today www.mysouldiary.com

name: BLW CIMS
description:
CIMS through data optimization and process automation achieves paperless interaction, and intelligent data mining. It is designed to enable several ministry units collaborate effectively and efficiently and is outfitted for remote monitoring via mobile devices. 

CIMS successfully maximizes the value of church data gathering, acquired from the day-to-day operations of our ministry processes and solves completely the challenges of reporting. Utilizing any of its over 50 indicators, this application allows the Pastor evaluate the commitment of every single member and/or groups at different levels and accurately describes the all round growth rate of a church, regardless of its size.

With BLW CIMS, accurate data analysis will enhance targeted communication and will lead to an unprecedented explosion in church membership, increased partnership commitment, high patronage of ministry materials, consistency in cell meetings and church services attendance. 

Why is this relevant for you? Users will be able to sign into their account from three different interfaces and update their records on the go.

• Collation and data integration of new members, their attendance at cell meetings, church services/programs and data evaluation from updated cell meeting reports, weekly cell performance all at your fingertips.

As a Church /Group/Zonal/Regional Pastor, you will be able to compare performances in terms of Partnership, Church membership growth, Cell system growth, First fruit, Tithe, Givings and Ministry projects, Ministry material purchases etc.

• Staff members in the various churches and at various levels will also be able to collaborate effectively in the areas of Finance; PFCC; Sacraments and Ceremonies; First Timers ministry, Foundation school; Services department coordination and Ministry materials sales.

• Preloaded with intelligent short message and email notification services.

GET THE BLW CIMS today, call us now on 07088693672 or send us a mail info@mvacontest.com

name: BibleMan Game
description:
It is a whole new concept in preaching the Gospel through gaming!!!
In these end times a perfect understanding of what the word says is advantageous to win in the market place of life. Bibleman is an animated game specially developed to teach you more about the word of God in an exciting way. The questions are carefully selected from the world's best devotional: Rhapsody of Realities.

The aim of the game is to drive home the points emphasized in the teachings of Pastors Chris and Anita Oyakhilome, refresh your heart with scriptures and make you word-proficient.

The game comprises of three stages containing six questions each. A question must be read and answered in fifteen seconds. If the timer runs out, during the game, you have two chances; you can have a time out i.e. you can desist from answering two questions or you can answer two questions wrongly. If you exhaust either of the two, then you quit the game and have to start all over.

name: Enterprise Sales Portal
description:
Enterprise Sales Portal is a unique solution for the simplification of ministry materials orders, purchases, stock inventory and reports. With this application, individuals can preview new releases, purchase materials anytime, anywhere and have it delivered (in hard copy). Churches can also place orders, keep track, take stock inventory and generate necessary reports. 

A must-have for every Christian and Church Resource Centre. 

Log on now to www.enterprisesalesportal.com to start exploring.

To obtain an account for your church, please send a mail to info@mvacontest.com

name: Minmat Tile Game
description:
MinMat Game is a TilePic mobile game App designed to help introduce our ministry materials in a fun and engaging manner. Players can select the back cover of the listed books and select difficulty levels. 

Special features of this App include a push notification system and previews on ministry material resources. Users can also comment on reviews on selected messages and navigate to our online store to purchase any ministry material. 

It is fun for kids and adults alike! 

Log on to www.minmatgame.com to enjoy!

name: Alpha
description:
Alpha is a simplified Management Software designed for the effectiveness of Church operations. 

It gives Cell Leaders the unique platform to fill in and submit their cell registers online. Alpha also helps to successfully manage Finance, Administration, Members and First Timers directories. It is a robust application valuable for Church/Cell information management, optimization and automation. Reports are easily generated at the click of a button.

Visit www.alphadb.org to explore.

To obtain an account for your church or cell, please send a mail to info@mvacontest.com

name: Hagah
description:
An exciting dictionary to facilitate the comprehensive study of God’s Word. Key features of the App include Greek dictionary, Hebrew dictionary, embedded Bible (Youversion), note-taking section and Word for the Month (a periodic blog that displays and features Greek/Hebrew words that the Man of God, Pastor Chris Oyakhilome Ph.D emphasizes in his teachings). It also includes links to Pastorchrislive on Yookos and other ministry websites.

Coming soon on the Apple Store!

name: iGoChristEmbassy
description:
iGoChristEmbassy is an awesome application that allows individuals worldwide locate Christ Embassy Churches and Cell Groups at a click of a button. 

With this App, all Christ Embassy churches and service schedules can be located and accessed from one universal platform. 

 Individuals can log in requests to a selected church(es) and receive details within minutes via sms or email. Brethren who are out-stationed or newly relocated can also get information on the closest Christ Embassy Church or Cell group in their vicinity. 

This will lead to an unprecedented increase in church membership, services and cell meeting attendance. 

Log on to www.igochristembassy.org to explore!

To obtain an account for your Church or Cell, please send a mail to info@mvacontest.com

name: Loveworld Careers
description:
Loveworld careers is a web-based App for job search, recruitments and recommendations. It aids internal hiring (within the ministry, Believers’ LoveWorld Inc.) and external hiring (private firms that consider the spirituality of their employees). The platform allows users navigate easily through their professional connections while incorporating key features such as recommendations and private messaging. 

LoveWorld Careers provides an inspiring professional climate that fosters interactivity among users and an overall user experience that keeps job recruiters and seekers engaged.

name: Tithe Tracker
description: An exciting web-based App for the effective management of tithe remittances and records. With this app, users can keep track of their income, calculate payable tithes and record tithing information. It has an inbuilt notification system which promptly reminds users whenever tithes are due and also sends uplifting scriptures on finances based on a pre-selected schedule.

name: Word Agent
description:
WordAgent application is designed to meet the need of every Christian who has a desire to feed ravenously on the Word of God. This unique application provides you that platform to maximally utilize the unending benefits of having on your mobile device, the audio and video formats of Word-based teachings from the Man of God; Rev. Chris Oyakhilome(PhD.) and effectively places the user on “Word diets” needed to enlighten on specific areas of this life. 

The phenomenal features of this App include genre classification, media playing, note-taking, note-scheduling and cloud-hosting functions to keep directing your thoughts and confessions to God’s Word. 

The effect of this is, YOU become the Word-indomitable, impregnable and full of glory!!!

name: BLW Lyrics
description:
BLW Lyrics App is a timely music lyrics application which consists of Holy-Ghost inspired lyrics of our talented BLW music ministers. Now you can know words of the song and sing along with the melody! BLW Lyrics App has a biography for each minister, song title & lyrics to all their songs. There are also search & share features. What's more?! You can also request for a song to be uploaded!! 

Our paperless Song book is here! Your praise & worship experience just got upgraded.

Available for download on Android devices.

name: CE & You
description:
CE & You is specially designed for the First-Timers Ministry; as a tool for effective first time ministration and soul retainership.

This app is strategically designed for first timers to Christ Embassy churches, with inbuilt rich content articles and materials to educate and enlighten the first timers about the Christian faith and the person of the Christian.The app introduces the First Timer to Christ Embassy, clearly stating the vision, mission and purpose of the ministry.

Available for download on Android devices.

name: CE Mobile
description:
CEMobile is a platform independent mobile app that encompasses in scope, a very wide range of the ministry-activities and participations all in one app-platform. The app’s flexibility allows for easy and global access to the ministry. It brings the rich intriguing content and utilities of the ministry in a more palatable layout- as one could virtually access all ministry’s day to day activities and up to date events from one platform.
1. Participate in the online question and answer segment with the man of God. The app enables you to send your questions right from where you are.
2. Keep abreast of programs and events information at the ministry, zonal and local church levels.

3. Read and share testimonies in different categories such as healings, miracles, and salvations.
4. Enjoy news splashes, communion services video clips, New Year’s message highlights and ministry promos etc.

Available for download on Android devices.

name: Cell Manager
description:
Cell Manager App provides a robust platform for quick and efficient information dissemination within the Cell Ministry. It also provides a platform for the church PFCC to manage the existing PCF, Cells, and Bible Study Class system in an efficient and cost effective manner.
With the Cell Manager App, Cell Leaders can submit reports of their cell meetings such as Total attendance, First-timer, Offering, testimonies etc. online and real-time.

Available for download on Android devices.

name: Communion Serv.Tracker
description:
An Application that helps you track your progress after every communion service with our Man of God Rev Chris Oyakhilome. With this app, you can take notes during Communion service, write action points and stay focused on the Word for the Month.

Available for download on Android devices.

name: F.School Mobile
description:
The Foundation School Mobile App (FSM) is a mobile app designed exclusively for the foundation school department and the students of the school during the course of their study.  The app is structured to upgrade and improve the operations of the foundation school department and to create the most advantageous ambiance of learning for the students.

This is a cross platform mobile solution, developed to promote, enrich, facilitate and deliver exceptional teaching skills from the foundation school department and gives the student the most refreshing, uplifting and educating time through God’s word at the foundation school. The app also serves as a reference material after graduation.

Available for download on Android devices.

name: Keep Saying it
description:
This robust App is a Library of Confessions and Prayers from past editions of Rhapsody of Realities and other Ministry Materials. Users can set confession reminder alarms at various times within the day, add confession widgets to their home screen and with the inbuilt search engine, users can locate confessions and prayers grouped under different categories such as Success and Prosperity, Wisdom, New Creation Realities, Salvation and soul winning, Righteousness, Divine Health, etc

Available for download on Android devices.

name: Rhema Browser
description:
The ‘Rhema Browser’ is a world class mobile web browser application, which will allow users to access the internet most easily, and also give them a one-touch access to our ministry websites, prayer posts from our man of God, and other any evangelical content available from our ministry, with the primary aim of furthering the gospel of our lord Jesus Christ

The world today is a global village, and an internet browser is the window to connect to this wonderful globe-sphere.
With the ‘Rhema Browser’ application device users will be able to access the internet speedily, and use the advanced features available in major browsers today, while also having to opportunity to connect to the word of God most easily!

Available for download on Android devices.

name: Mandate ROR
description:
Mandateror is a subscription application based on the activities of Rhapsody Mandate. It is a subscription application that eases the work of subscribing others as Rhapsody of Realities subscribers. It is meant to keep track of a repository of subscribers, while at the same time tracking the analytics of their subscriptions for example; is the material delivered, what are the periods of subscription, how many subscribers do I have so far, and personal performance criteria. However it can be used for other subscription activities other than Subscribing for Rhapsodies.

Available for download on Android devices.

name: TEENZMOBI
description:
TEENZMOBI is an easy to use, platform independent mobile app that runs on different mobile operating systems; exclusively designed for Believers’ LoveWorld teenagers.
TEENZMOBI will facilitate the growth of the teenagers in the ministry through its rich dynamic frame work that would allow for quality contents to suit the exact requisite of the teenagers and encourage their active participation in ministry events and programs.
The app was designed to support great flexibilities and excellent functionalities that allow the Director of the teen’s ministry to communicate directly with teenagers all around the world irrespective of time and location.

Available for download on Android devices.

name: File Sorter
description:
Email files sorter

Available for download on Android devices.

name: Zakar
description:
Zakar (Hebrew for remember/record) is  a partner caring tool that helps the partnership admin to treat partner data accurately and seamlessly. It gives the partners the privilege of recording their partnership themselves with final validation from the partnership admin. It will also help the partnership admin to not only collate data seamlessly but be able to send receipts to partners in form of push notifications, sms and email. Notifications for other activities like events, birthdays, testimonies, partner rankings and more can be sent too.

Available for download on Android devices.

name: ROR Reference
description:
This app allows you to search through old editions of Rhapsody of Realities and find articles relating to a particular subject or keyword. It gives you details on the article and details of the edition of ROR which contains it.

Available for download on Android devices.

name: Audio Translator
description:
Audio Translator is a mobile voice or Audio file translator application. With this app, you can translate texts and speech from one language to the other. It eradicates language barriers and opens opportunities for borderless impact of the Gospel.

Available for download on Android devices.

name: ConnectdLive
description: ConnectdLive is a real-time classroom that allows a user to create a classroom and have people register as students to ask questions in that classroom. It addresses two issues. The first is the global classroom service; this will allow questions to be asked live creating a live questions and answers environment. Secondly, it addresses live blogging on Yookos, where updates are not real time and the page has to be refreshed to get recent discussions.

name: Homologea
description:
Homologea is a confession audio app. Tap the app icon on your device,select language,filter for confession category,select the confession you want,tap to play! This app will help you replay the confessions from rhapsody of realities   and you can repeat along. The app also contains confession cards in case you don’t want to play the audio you can swipe through the confession cards. Currently available in English and French. More Languages will be added continuously. You can also record your own confession with your own voice

Available for download on Android devices.

name: CE Celebrations
description:
The app is specially built and designed to facilitate and manage one thing; your contact’s celebrations.  It manages your church and personal contacts celebrations messages, reminders and alerts. Such celebrations include: birthdays, weddings, graduation party, award ceremony, car dedication, house dedication, child naming ceremony and other special events.
The App informs and prompts you of current celebrations and updates you of upcoming celebrations of your church contacts. Through the App, members of the ministry can send message(s) to their contacts.

Available for download on Android devices.

name: E-Learnerdo
description: E-learnerdo is a mobile and web (cross compactable platform) that promotes online education to empower everyone both young and old from all works of life to learn and do more with the opportunities our good Lord provides through his word. The platform makes this possible by providing its users with a body of knowledge and leading examples gotten from the word of god and our ministry materials. The provision of online programs, e-foundation school program, group study on ministry materials that is made available both for free and paid.

name: LW Chat
description:
A mobile chat application, which allows its users to connect and share information with ALL their phone contact (both phone and social network contacts).
The mobile application, leverages on the combination of the selling features of major mobile chat applications that are presently in existence. By implication, users can chat with their phone contacts (like whatsapp), and also with their social network contacts (like 2go and nimbuzz) e.g  facebook, google plus, and any other major social network that comes up in future, thereby giving the ministry a great potential of harnessing a very large number of users.
Most significantly, users of the app can also share prayer posts, and other ministry content directly to their phone contacts

Available for download on Android devices.

name: BLW Exam Portal
description: The application was developed with the motive of serving as a smooth and easy platform for members in the Believers Loveworld Nation to conduct examinations. This application also turns to serve as a full cross-platform for all Pastors, Deaconry, PCFs, Senior PCFs, Cell Leaders, Cell Members, and even the Teenagers to take their respective tests and get their results as per each test.

name: Marriage Counsellor
description:
This app is a platform independent mobile application designed to facilitate and enhance marriage preparation and celebration procedures. The app helps to manage the activities and events of your marriage right from inception up until after the wedding celebrations.

MMA allows for great flexibility in managing weddings from marriage classes to post wedding activities. It has being noted that a lot of time, effort, financial resources, expertise etc. goes into planning and wedding activities and sometimes resources are unduly engaged and eventually wasted. This app help the church manage the weddings of the members at a convenience.

name: Robot
description: Robot
